definitions: in a way that lacks friendliness or enthusiasm
shortDefinitions: in way that lacks friendliness or enthusiasm

definitions: in a way that shows a lack of any excitement, anxiety, or excessive emotion

examples.text: passengers were able to deal with the possible threat coolly and calmly

shortDefinitions: in way that shows lack of excitement, anxiety, or excessive emotion

definitions: in a way that is fashionably attractive or impressive

examples.text: she was coolly dressed down in cut-off jean shorts

shortDefinitions: in way that is fashionably attractive or impressive
